profile_positions.description:
Purchasing, stock management, pricing and sales for brands like (HPI si HPE, Lexmark, Kyocera, Epson,Canon, Dell, IBM, Lenovo, Fujitsu, Philips, Cisco, Apple, Asus, Acer, Toshiba, Intel, Sony, Samsung, Microsoft,  etc.)
Increase sales, profitability and stock rotation for managed product categories
Increase and develop market share for all managed brands. Business development or commercial planning within information; technology, internet

Managing the sales process: contacting the customer, selling the value of support, pricing the order, performing the retention procedures, etc.
Handling any resulting queries that the customers may have about their products for both License and Hardware line of business

Negotiating prices, agreeing contracts and liaising between suppliers, manufacturers and customers.
Achieve growth and hit sales targets by successfully colaborate with the sales team effort.
Design and implement a strategic business plan that expands company’s customer base and ensure it’s strong presence.
Build and promote strong, long-lasting customer relationships by partnering with them and understand their needs
Present sales, revenue and expenses reports and realistic forecasts to the management team
Identify emerging markets and market shifts while being fully aware of new products and competition status
Maintain sales volume, product mix, and selling price by keeping current with supply and demand, changing trends, economic indicators, and competitors.
Establishing and adjusts selling prices by monitoring costs, competition, and supply and demand.
Maintain professional and technical knowledge by reviewing professional publications; establishing personal networks; participating in professional societies.
Establish budgets with the client and company.
Meet time deadlines for accounts.
Organize shipments.
Contribute to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.
Managing the day-to-day operations of the business.
profile_positions.title: Regional Sales Manager Ro & Bg

profile_positions.description:
For the last 15 years, my father and I have been dealing with a family micro-farm in the agricultural sector, namely melon cultivation, an activity starting annually with seasonal cultivation operations and ending with the organized effort to sell products. in various wholesale outlets located in Galati / Bacau / Focsani / Iasi counties.
I mention that in the last 10 years we have mainly used Syngenta products in our microfarm, these having a very good yield in quantitative production, but also in qualitative one. Also, the products chosen from Syngenta's portfolio for watermelon crops proved to be very good due to the resistance of the plants to the characteristics of the drier land where they were sown.
Regarding the aspects related to the marketing and promotion of the resulting agricultural products of watermelon, we did this both through online channels and offline channels methods.
Through offline channels using traditional methods of sale in the wholesale or retail agricultural markets or directly to the customer in some minimarket chains in Bacau.
The promotion and marketing using online methods was done through various platforms and marketplace networks for agriculture.

I also mention that over the years I have interacted with other vegetable crops such as tomatoes, cucumbers, bell peppers.
profile_positions.title: Sales And Marketing Specialist
Regional sales manager South Romania

profile_positions.description:
The Bid Desk team member acts in a global environment, multicultural, and is
the contact point for all matters relating to price controls and approval
processes. It is responsible for the entire process of approvals and offer
assurance that this process is followed according to the rules and regulations
agreed, with a variety of responsibilities, such as:

Support for sales operations:
• Point of contact between the Department of EMEA operations and sales;
• Providing support and assistance in processing applications, in accordance
with existing rules and procedures agreed;
• Processing and recording in the time agreed the requests from customers,
partners, partner teams, sales representatives and other trade groups;
• Acquiring advanced skills of process and tools in order to complete complex
tasks ( knowledge of Special Pricing and pricing tools)
Analysis of prices:
• Acquiring skills in tendering and acting in accordance with company policies
and procedures;
• Acquiring knowledge in functional: special HP pricing policy, approvals,
delegations;
• Processing and coordination of standard and non-standard request received
from certain clients.
Knowledge in the area of programs and processes:
• Use of systems / programs / procedures in verifying the accuracy and
validation HP data included in applications;
• Well informed about the price policy, promotions, and other relevant
information for the correct systems applications;
• Learning tendering process particularities of prices globally;
• Preparation of reports and memos about the applications processed, orders,
transactions, and publishing data on the internal website so that reports can be
viewed by all teams involved.
